problems.title: Burning Smell / Belt Broken
problems.description: Smell of burnt rubber and brush roll stopped spinning.
solution_steps: Remove the 4 screws on the bottom plate.
Remove the old belt and loop the new belt around the motor shaft and brush.

problems.title: Loss of Suction
problems.description: Vacuum feels weak or is blowing dust.
solution_steps: Open the dust cup lid and wash the foam filter.
Detach the hose from the base and check for clogs.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a PowerSpeed Lightweight Upright (NEU180)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $395 vacuum, and extending the life of your Eureka is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my PowerSpeed Lightweight Upright (NEU180) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my PowerSpeed Lightweight Upright (NEU180) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
